altTitles.ja: この関係は合法です!

description.en:
YES Sister, NO Touch!

Kouta, who is extremely siscon, decides to live alone in order to "escape from his little sister ". One day, however, he picks up a runaway girl named Ui, who is full of younger sisterly feelings. Although she looks and acts like a child, she is in fact a beautiful 19-year-old girl with big tits!

Protect his sister? or Crossing the line? The days of agony begin!

altTitles.ja: 美味しんぼ

description.en:
Around the offices of Tozai News, Shiro Yamaoka has a reputation for being over-blunt, under-ambitious, and generally an all-around slacker. So why has he been given the important job of coming up with the "Ultimate Menu" to celebrate the newspaper's 100th anniversary? Because he possesses qualities his other colleagues don't: an exquisitely discerning palate, an encyclopedic knowledge of food and drink, and a masterful touch in the kitchen.

---
- **Won the Shogakukan Manga Award for Seinen/General in 1987**

altTitles.ja: 無限レベルアップin武林

description.en:
Killed on the battlefield without glory to his name, Yuseong Dan receives an opportunity to grow stronger with a strange quest and level system. But each quest he’s forced to fight only seems to be getting harder and harder. Can he level up enough to avoid the same miserable ending and become the powerful hero he wishes to be?

---
- [Official Japanese Translation](https://manga.line.me/product/periodic?id=Z0001443)
description.ja:
ここは努力したぶん強くなれる世界

---
- [Official Japanese Translation](https://manga.line.me/product/periodic?id=Z0001443)
description.ko:
재능도 없고 출신도 비천했던 하급무사 단유성, 전쟁터에서 죽다.
하지만 저승인 줄 알고 눈을 떴더니, 어린 시절의 과거로 돌아와 있지 않은가?
이상한 숫자와 문자가 눈 앞에 보이고, 그 지시를 따르면 노력한 만큼 보상을 받기까지 한다.
노력한 만큼의 보상을 받는 세상. 무한레벨업 in 무림에 오신것을 환영합니다.

---
- [Official Japanese Translation](https://manga.line.me/product/periodic?id=Z0001443)
description.ru:
Тан Ю Сон, младший воин, не имевший таланта, с низким уровнем подготовки, погиб на поле боя.

Но когда он открыл глаза, он был сильно удивлён! Он вернулся в свое прошлое, когда ещё был ребёнком! Теперь он может изменить будущее!

---
- [Official Japanese Translation](https://manga.line.me/product/periodic?id=Z0001443)
description.pt-br: Morto no campo de batalha sem glória para seu nome, Yuseong Dan recebe a oportunidade de ficar mais forte com uma estranha missão e sistema de níveis. Mas cada missão que ele é forçado a lutar parece estar ficando cada vez mais difícil. Ele pode subir de nível o suficiente para evitar o mesmo final miserável e se tornar o herói poderoso que deseja ser?

altTitles.ja: 桃源暗鬼

description.en: Ichinose Shiki, an inheritor of the blood of Oni had lived out his entire childhood oblivious to this fact. However, when an unknown man comes rushing into his home in attempts to assassinate him, his foster father finally reveals the truth. In a world where Oni and Momotarou have never been able to coexist, join Ichinose in his struggle for power and unifying the two races!

altTitles.en: Even 'Used Goods' Wants to Experience Love!
Even If It Is Second Hand, I Want to Fall in Love!

altTitles.pt-br: Eu não preciso de uma heroína real

altTitles.ru: Даже использованный товар желает испытать любовь

altTitles.th: มือสองแล้วทําไมถ้าใจคิดจะรัก

altTitles.ja: 現実の彼女はいりません!

description.en: Aramiya Seiichi is an ordinary high school eroge otaku who's given up all hope on girls in the 3D world due to a certain incident. One day, after he's bought a bunch of new material in consequence of experiencing the frustration of a perfect eroge character turning out to be used goods, he encounters a delinquent-like-looking girl being about to get raped by a bunch of guys. By mere chance, he rescues her. Days later, when school starts again, it turns out to have been his classmate, Ayame, a feared delinquent girl who's got all kind of rumors about her, especially that she's used goods. And it appears that she's set on becoming his ideal girl to make him fall for her.
description.ja: 三次元に興味ナシのオタクな高校生・新宮清一は、ひょんなことから学校一の不良少女・綾女古都子に告白される。当然の如くこれを断固拒否！　……した清一だったが、古都子は「じゃあ、お前の理想になってやるよ！」とメインヒロインのようなツインテ美少女に変貌して、強引なアプローチで迫り始め…？
description.pt: Aramiya Seiichi é um estudante ordinário… Um otaku dos eroges que perdeu todas as esperanças nas garotas em 3D devido um certo incidente. Um dia, após ele comprar alguns materiais novos devido uma frustração em consequência de uma experiência frustrante com uma "personagem perfeita" de um eroge, ele encontra uma garota delinquente prestes a ser estuprada por um grupo de homens. Por um acaso ele acaba salvando ela, e por este acaso a sua vida acaba mudando completamente...
description.ru: Когда Сейчи учился в младших классах, он получил психическую травму из-за некой девушки. С тех самых пор, он с недоверием относится к девушкам, и испытывает отвращение к не девственницам. Сейчас Сейчи эроге-отаку, ученик старшей школы, однажды вечером он оказывается свидетелем попытки изнасилования девушки группой людей, случайно привлекая внимания насильников, он использует смекалку и успешно спасает себя и девушку. Девушка оказывается известной хулиганкой, и о ней часто ходят не очень хорошие слухи, а что не менее важно, девушка эта – одноклассница Сейчи, Аямэ. После того дня, она влюбляется в главного героя, и решает добиться его расположения любым способом. Видя потуги девушки, учительница Сейчи просит его помочь Аямэ стать нормальной девушкой, на что тот неохотно соглашается. Так и начинается история о парне, который пытается исправить хулиганку, попутно устраняя все нажитые ею слухи, и о девушке, которая хочет любви.

title.en: Otaku ni Otoku na Gal Gurashi

altTitles.ja-ro: Otaku ni Otoku na Gal Gurashi

altTitles.ja: オタクにオトクなギャルぐらし

altTitles.ja-ro: Otaku ni Otoku na Gyaru Gurashi

altTitles.en: An Otaku and an Otaku Gyaru's Life Together
Otaku and Gyaru Living Together With Benefits
A Gal’s Guide To Budget Living for an Otaku

description.en: Yutaka Kongouji is the son of a wealthy family, but also an introvert and an otaku. He lives only to spend all his allowance supporting his favorite idol. But when his parents' business fails, he has to move into a run-down apartment on his own. There he ran into Rino Hyuga, a popular gal in his class...

title.en: I'll Resign and Have a Fresh Start in This World

altTitles.en: I'm Going To Relax in This World After Submitting My Resignation
Resigning and Healing in Another World

description.en:
The main character, Cho Isu, lived an ordinary but happy life.
Five years ago, he suddenly loses his parents, and becomes a devastated man, as he struggles every day.
When he was exhausted from the suffocating daily life, a portal opened in the room. A place he has never been to, a place he doesn’t know what might be.
A healing life to enjoy in a different world starting as a commoner and turning into a feudal lord.

title.en: Tondemo Skill de Isekai Hourou Meshi: Sui no Daibouken

altTitles.en: Campfire Cooking in Another World with My Absurd Skill: Sui’s Great Adventure

altTitles.ja: とんでもスキルで異世界放浪メシ スイの大冒険

description.en: A spin-off of the series TONDEMO SKILL DE ISEKAI HOUROU MESHI told from Sui's perspective.

altTitles.vi: Chuyên gia trêu chọc Takagi-san (ngoại truyện)

altTitles.ja: からかい上手の（元）高木さん

altTitles.tl: Ang Magaling sa Panunuksong (Noon) si Takagi-san

description.en:
Takagi and Nishikata are now married and have a kindergarten-aged daughter named Chi. See how much some things have changed, and others have curiously stayed the same!  
  
*Note: The volumes collect the chapters in a different order than the web version. The chapters here follow the web numbering without any volumes.*
description.pt-br:
Takagi e Nishikata agora estão casados e têm uma filha na idade do jardim de infância chamada Chi. Veja o quanto algumas coisas mudaram e outras curiosamente permaneceram as mesmas!

Nota: Os volumes coletam os capítulos em uma ordem diferente da versão web. Os capítulos aqui seguem a numeração da web sem nenhum volume.

altTitles.en: I Reincarnated as a Legendary Surgeon

description.en:
Because of being just, before even becoming specialist, Jisoo Han, a 3rd year of general surgery, has died.
Was it an angel, demon, or some unknown system of the world? Because of his good deeds, he got a chance to live again.
But he was resurrected as a dead man who was killed by mountain bandits. But this body… Is it the body of a great legendary surgeon?!
A generation of heroes with an endless battle, about in the year 200. As a great legendary surgeon of the 200’s, he tries to stand up to it……
An unexpected and extraordinary journey of a young surgeon, who fell into the world of Romance of the Three Kingdoms, has began!

---

**Links:**
- [Original Webtoon (Kakao Webtoon)](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%ED%99%94%ED%83%80%EA%B0%80-%EB%90%9C-%EC%99%B8%EA%B3%BC%EC%9D%98%EC%82%AC/2736)
description.fr:
Était-ce un ange, un démon ou autre chose qui m'a ressuscité ?
Jisoo Han, un major de troisième année en chirurgie générale, a perdu la vie en raison de sa personnalité droite. Cependant, grâce aux bonnes actions qu'il a faites dans sa vie, il a été ressuscité dans le corps d'un homme mort qui a été tué par des bandits de montagne. Mais ce corps… Est-ce le corps d'un grand chirurgien légendaire ?! Maintenant, dans l'ère des Trois Royaumes de guerres et de héros [CE 200]. Jisoo essaie de survivre et de se tenir debout en tant que chirurgien légendaire ……
Le voyage inattendu et extraordinaire d'un jeune chirurgien, tombé dans l'ère des Trois Royaumes, a commencé !
description.ko:
정의로운 성격 때문에 전문의는 커녕, 목숨까지 잃은 일반외과 전공 3년차 한진수.

천사인가, 악마인가, 아님 알 수 없는 시스템인가.
평소 쌓은 선행 덕분에 부활의 기회를 얻게 된다.

산적 떼에게 죽은 몸으로 부활하게 된 한진수.
그런데 이 몸이 전설의 명의名醫 화타?!

전란이 끊임없는 영웅들의 시대, 혼란한 후한 말.
한진수, 그는 후한 말 명의名醫 화타로서 우뚝 서려 한다…….

<삼국지연의> 속 세상에 떨어진 젊은 외과의사가 펼치는 
기상천외한 모험이 시작된다!"

altTitles.ja: 気絶勇者と暗殺姫

altTitles.vi: Dũng giả gục ngã và Công chúa sát thủ

altTitles.en: The Fainted Hero and The Assassination Princess

description.en: Toto is a novice hero who has finally put together the team that he'd always wanted. And he's ready to set out on a new adventure. But Toto's new party members' actual target is... his life?!

altTitles.ja: 隣の席の奴がエロい目で見てくる話

altTitles.vi: Người bàn bên thường nhìn tôi bằng ánh mắt biến thái

altTitles.fr: Etes-vous Prêts à tout le monde?

altTitles.ja: みなさまエト・ヴ・プレ？

description.en: Chika Kuwabara pretty much drifts through life with no purpose, her days spent at arcades or getting into petty fights. But one day, she witnesses someone practicing fencing in the school gymnasium. That glimpse begins to awaken something deep inside her!

title.en: Jojoni Deremi ga Mashiteku Tsundere Gyaru

altTitles.ja: 徐々にデレ味が増してくツンデレギャル

altTitles.vi: Cô nàng gal tsundere ngày càng đáng yêu hơn

altTitles.ja-ro: Jojoni Deremi ga Mashiteku Tsundere Gal
Jojoni Deremi ga Mashiteku Tsundere Gyaru

altTitles.tr: Tsundere Gal Günden Güne Daha Sevimli Hale Geliyor

altTitles.en: The Tsundere Gal Whose Dere Side Gradually Increases

title.en: Gambling Outcast Kaiji: The Kazuya Arc - Kaiji Part 4

altTitles.ja: 賭博堕天録 カイジ 和也編

description.en: Kaiji wins the anomalous two-player mahjong game "17 Steps" against the villainous president Muraoka, and gains a huge sum of 480 million yen! While the aftermath of that game is still fresh on everyone's minds, Kazuya, the son of Hyoudou Kazutaka, the chairman of the Teiai Group, offers him another game!

title.en: The Flower That Was Bloomed by a Cloud

description.en:
Hong Lyon, a pitiful young princess only in title, who has no power nor authority, meets a young nobleman named Dowun who offers to help her take what's rightfully hers… but at what cost?  
  
Winner of the 2019 Tory Comics Award.  


---

**Links**  
- [Official Chinese (Simplified) Translation](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/LOVE/yunzhonghua/list?title_no=1412)

title.en: Magic, me, and my big master!

altTitles.ja: 魔法と僕とでっかい師匠

altTitles.zh: 魔法与我与伟大的师父

altTitles.ja-ro: Mahou to Boku to Dekkai Shishou

title.en: Screw the Noble Life, I’m Going Home

altTitles.en: Noble Lady or Whatever, I'm Going Home

description.en:
After confirming that I had won the lottery, I tried to quit my job! However, as soon as I opened the door, I found myself transmigrated into the body of a noble lady. I have one year to claim the prize money, so I have to return home at all costs. Please wait for me, my 1.7 million won! Mum will be there soon, but... What's wrong with this family?!

"I love you." But I'm not your daughter!

"Sister, you might get hurt so I'll hold you." Did he mean he would lift me? What is this guy, a giant brown bear?

"If you mess with our sister one more time, I'll make you disappear without a trace." He's got a pretty face, but he has a sharp tongue.

"Don't fall ill." Don't worry about me. Why are there so many of them?! I'm not a noble lady! Leave me alone, I wanna go home!

altTitles.th: บากิ ศึกอสูรจอมประจัญบาน

altTitles.ja: バキ

altTitles.es-la: El nuevo Luchador Baki: En busca de nuestro héroe más fuerte

altTitles.en: New Grappler Baki: In Search of Our Strongest Hero

description.en:
Baki Hanma is a generally happy student with a rather odd hobby; he likes fighting. Specifically, he likes fighting in a secret martial arts tournament that gathers the greatest fighters of the world and pits them against each other in really nasty combat. Whether you're a sumo wrestler, a karate expert, or a guy who specializes in ripping out your opponent's nerves, you're welcome to participate (as long as you can keep quiet about it, of course). Anyway, Baki may be the youngest fighter the tournament has ever seen, but he's also the best, and he really enjoys what he does.  
   
AnimeNewsNetwork Links:  
[Season 1](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/encyclopedia/anime.php?id=2035)  
[Season 2](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/encyclopedia/anime.php?id=2036)
description.pt-br:
Baki Hanma é um estudante geralmente feliz com um hobby bastante estranho; ele gosta de lutar. Especificamente, ele gosta de lutar em um torneio secreto de artes marciais que reúne os maiores lutadores do mundo e coloca-os uns contra os outros em combates realmente desagradáveis. Seja você um lutador de sumô, um especialista em karatê ou um cara que se especializou em arrancar os nervos do seu oponente, você pode participar (contanto que possa manter segredo sobre isso, é claro). De qualquer forma, Baki pode ser o lutador mais jovem que o torneio já viu, mas ele também é o melhor, e ele realmente gosta do que faz. 

Ps: Está sendo postado/traduzido desde o Segundo Arco que não foi animado

title.en: I Picked a Hammer to Save the World

description.en:
After defeating the commander of the seventh Corps of the Demon King’s Army, ‘Tiny’ was about to die. However, in a desperate situation where the destruction of mankind can not be prevented, the last surviving comrade, ‘Sword Emperor’, uses the power of an heirloom to send Tiny back in the past.
Tiny, who has returned from being the strongest knight on the continent to an orphan in the slums, gains new powers that he did not possess in his previous life. Can Tiny, in this life, prevent the extinction of mankind?

altTitles.ja: Seijun Shoujo Paradigm

description.en: Paradigm Girls Academy, a famous catholic combined middle and high school. Not interested in love, Aoi hopes a school life among the virtuous Ojou-sama would turn her into a graceful and high-class lady herself. Riri thought joining a girls’ school would allow her to finally find love. Bonding over having their dreams meet a harsh reality, a beautiful friendship(?) begins.
description.pt-br: Paradigm Girls Academy é um famoso colégio católico que reúne ensino fundamental e médio. Não interessada em amor, Aoi espera que uma vida escolar entre as virtuosas Ojou-sama a transforme em uma graciosa senhorita de classe alta. Riri, por outro lado pensou que juntar-se a uma escola para meninas permitiria que ela finalmente encontrasse o amor. Unidas por seus sonhos frustrados, uma bela amizade começa.

altTitles.ja: ポジジション

description.en: This manga is about the every day occurrences in Sukiya Keiko's not all that ordinary life. From meeting a person that can fly to being all alone in the world she experiences things beyond and within your average day.

altTitles.th: นักรักโลกมายา
หน้ากากแก้ว

altTitles.ja: ガラスの仮面

description.en:
Chigusa Tsukikage holds the rights to the play "The Crimson Goddess," a lost masterpiece that many would love to see brought back to the stage.  
  
Tsukikage, however, won't allow the cherished work to be diminished by an actress who isn't worthy of playing the title role. Fortunately, she has found two young actresses that just might be worthy: Maya Kitajima and Ayumi Himekawa. Though both actresses are exceptionally talented, only one can win the coveted role.

---
- **Won the Japan Cartoonists Association Award in 1995**

---

Published in Indonesian by Elex Media as **Topeng Kaca**

altTitles.ja: 人間失格

description.en: Yozo Oba is a troubled soul incapable of revealing his true self to others. A weak constitution and the lingering trauma from some abuse administered by a relative forces him to uphold a facade of hollow jocularity since high school.

title.en: After School Lessons for Unripe Apples

altTitles.en: A 90's Cram School for the Unripened

altTitles.pt-br: Lições após a escola para maçãs não maduras

description.en:
That asshole is back as an entirely new level of asshole!   
  
In her final year of middle school, Hwang Miae is stuck with Kim Cheol, a boy she met briefly years ago - he's her classmate… and her neighbor. Now the other kids keep calling them a couple! In a flurry of uneasiness, Cheol starts to avoid Miae like the plague.   
  
You bastard! Do you think you're the only one going through this?   
  
But it doesn't stop there. Destiny won't leave them alone as Kim Cheol and Hwang Miae keep seeing each other everywhere… causing even more trouble. As strange friends intrude on their relationship, Miae experiences puberty the right way…   
  
A new project of <Cheese In The Trap> author Soonkki!
description.fr: Octobre 1998, Mi-Ae est juste une collégienne normale qui fait de son mieux pour mener une vie relativement tranquille à l'école. Elle aime lire des bandes dessinées, écouter le groupe pop «The Fire Boys», et faire du karaoké. Un jour, un garçon qu'elle connaissait est transféré dans son école et commence à causer des problèmes. Sauf que peu importe ce qu'elle fait, il semblerait qu'il n'apprécie pas les efforts de Mi-Ae pour apprendre à mieux le connaître. Ça veut dire quoi au juste ?!

altTitles.en: The Mob Boss’s Daughter and Her Caretaker

altTitles.ja: 組長娘と世話係

altTitles.vi: Con Gái Ông Trùm Băng Đảng và Người Trông Trẻ

altTitles.pt-br: O guia da Yakuza para babás

description.en:
Kirishima Tooru, Age 28, Sakuragi Group’s wakagashira.
Happily enjoys doing as he pleases because it’s the world of organized crime, he earned the title of “The Demon of the Sakuragi Group.”

Then one day, he ends up in charge of his boss’s only daughter!?   
An independent young lady and good-looking yakuza brute’s heartwarming (?) comedy!
description.pt-br: Kirishima Tooru, 28 anos, wakagashira do Grupo Sakuragi. Felizmente gosta de fazer o que bem entender, porque é o mundo do crime organizado, ele ganhou o título "O Demônio do Grupo Sakuragi". Então um dia, ele acabou encarregado da filha única do chefe?!

altTitles.ja: ちえりの恋は8メートル

altTitles.pt-br: O amor de Chieri tem 8 metros

description.en:
An ordinary high school student, Yumeji Kotaki, is transferred to his class by his childhood friend, Chieri Omine, who has grown to 8 meters in height! Yumeji is assigned as "caretaker" to support Chieri's school life. Their daily life is full of excitement due to the height difference! The height difference is nothing to worry about!

The start of a literally larger-than-life romcom!
description.pt-br:
Uma aluna transferida que tem 8 metros de altura...?! 
Amigos de infância se reencontram, mas nem tudo é como antes… Uma mudança na relação entre Chieri e Yumeji, acompanhe o desenrolar desta comédia romântica gigantesca.

altTitles.en: Lord of the Wheel of Fortune! When changes come to the world

description.en: A planet called Ghost Star suddenly appeared, causing the earth's animals and plants to evolve into monsters that can destroy humans. At the time of human extinction, people accidentally discovered a way to log into the ghost star, and found that they could gain power against monsters on the ghost star. So in order to survive, human beings started the era of exploring ghost stars...

altTitles.ja: ジャンク・ランク・ファミリー

description.en: The manga is a crossover with the OREN'S manga, which artist Yanse Kazu and Takahashi launched in September 2015 in Akita Shoten's Bessatsu Young Champion magazine.

title.en: Damedol to Sekai ni Hitori Dake no Fan

altTitles.ja: ダメドルと世界に1人だけのファン

altTitles.ja-ro: Damedol to Sekai ni Hitori Dake no Fan

altTitles.en: The Useless Idol and Her Only Fan in the World
A Useless Idol and the Only Fan in the World

altTitles.id: Idol Gak Guna dan Penggemar Satu-satunya di Dunia

altTitles.es-la: Una Idol inútil y su único fan en el mundo

altTitles.pt-br: Uma Idol Inútil E Seu Único Fã No Mundo

altTitles.en: Damedol and the Only Fan in the World

description.en:
"Urumin" is an idol, but she can't sing or dance well, and she's got a dishonest character. Kimiya is the only fan in the world who likes her. The relationship between the two of them is a little different from the usual relationships between idols and fans! 

This is a "precious" love comedy that depicts the daily life of a bad idol and the man who keeps on promoting her, and the way he loves her!
description.ja: "うるみん"はアイドルなのに歌も踊りもダメダメで性格も素直じゃない。そんな彼女を推している世界で一人だけのファン、キミヤ。ふたりの関係性は普通のアイドル、ファンとの関係性と違ってちょっと変！？ダメなアイドルと彼女を推し続ける男の日常を描く、愛し方がすごい「尊い」系ラブコメディ！
description.pt-br: “Urumin” é uma idol, mas ela não consegue cantar nem dançar bem e não costuma ser sincera com seus reais sentimentos. “Kimiya” é seu único fã. A relação entre eles é um pouco diferente das relações normais entre fãs e ídolos! Esta é uma comédia romântica que retrata a vida diária de uma idol completamente desajeitada e o homem que continua a apoiá-la, demonstrando seu fanatismo até nos piores momentos!

altTitles.ja: バキ外伝花のチハル

description.en:
(from ebookjapan):

The classic look, and a presence backed by an overwhelming sentimentality!　

The shocking story of Chiharu Shiba, the leader of a suicide squad of Bozozoku, is depicted in this work!
description.pt-br: Baki Gaiden: Hana no Chiharu abre como uma nova história na série Baki. A história se foca em Chiharu Shiba, o segundo capitão suicida da gangue de motociclistas Gandamashi Bomba. É uma história sobre um homem com coragem e seus modos de luta.

title.en: How to Gracefully Divorce a Dragon

altTitles.en: How to Divorce a Dragon Beautifully

description.en:
Twenty-year-old Jeong Seyun, a rabbit descendant, knows that dragons are considered the chaebols of the beast world. But she'd rather have a relationship based on love than an arranged marriage with a dragon. And as fate would have it, as soon as she enters college, she falls in love with fox descendant Kim Hangyeol at first sight! She musters up the courage to confess, but... to the wrong person?!
Will Seyun's dream of a romance come true? (Summary adapted from Kakaopage.)

title.en: This is Obviously a Yuri Manhua

altTitles.zh-ro: Ru ni suo jian zhe shi baihe man

altTitles.fr: En effet, il s'agit d'un yuri

description.en:
When the timid Wu You moves to a new high school, she quickly grows attached to her new deskmate, the gregarious Ye Yin. But there is more than meets the eye with Ye Yin, and as the days pass, Wu You's feelings begin to deepen.   
A love story between two secondary school classmates.  

Author's Lofter: [占](https://zhan6019.lofter.com/)
Author's Weibo: [@这里是占](https://www.weibo.com/u/6016748885)

title.en: I Became the Youngest Prince in the Novel

description.en:
The novel Chronicles of the Hero of Frosimar is a story about the failures of the protagonist not the successes.

“This is terrible.”

The First Emperor, who conquered the whole world, closed his eyes with a brief appreciation (after reading the novel).

But the moment he opened his eyes again, there were only a few lines about him in the Chronicles of the Hero of Frosimar.

This was because he became an imprisoned prince who met death with his first appearance (in the novel).

altTitles.ja: 女装

description.en: Update : 18-September-2023

title.en: Baki Gaiden: Gaia & Sikorsky - Sometimes Nomura—Two yet Three People Living Together

altTitles.ja: バキ外伝 ガイアとシコルスキー ～ときどきノムラ 二人だけど三人暮らし～

altTitles.ja-ro: Baki Gaiden: Gaia to Sikorsky - Tokidoki Nomura Futari Dakedo Sannin Kurashi

description.en: After approaching Gaia for a revenge match, Sikorsky is instead greeted with his new home...?!

altTitles.ja: バキ外伝 拳刃

description.en: Gaiden, written and illustrated by Kengo Miyatani, representing and describing Doppo's adventures.

altTitles.ja: チェンソーマン カラー版

description.en:
Broke young man + chainsaw dog demon = Chainsaw Man!  
  
The name says it all! Denji's life of poverty is changed forever when he merges with his pet chainsaw dog, Pochita! Now he's living in the big city and an official Devil Hunter. But he's got a lot to learn about his new job and chainsaw powers!  
Now in Color!
description.fr:
Jeune homme fauché + démon-chien-tronçonneuse = Chainsaw Man!

Tout est dans le titre! La vie précaire de Denji change à jamais quand il fusionne avec son chien-tronçonneuse de compagnie, Pochita! Maintenant, il vit en centre-ville et est un Devil Hunter officiel. Mais il a beaucoup à apprendre de son nouveau job et de ses pouvoirs de tronçonneuse!
Maintenant en couleur!
description.kk: «Мен әрқашан қарапайым өмір сүруді армандадым: жылы төсекте ұйықтау, таңертең тосаппен нан жеу, қызыммен кездесуге бару және күнде күлімдеу. Әкемнің өлімімен кейін бәрі өзгерді - енді, Почита, өлтіретін кез келді!» - бұл сөзбен  Денжи өзінің шынжырлы иті Почитамен бірге басқа шартқа аттанады, өйткені олар сайтан аулаушылар. Күн сайын олар ақша үшін өлтіреді, оны Денджи бір якудзаға беруі керек, әйтпесе ол марқұм әкесінің қарызын өз өмірімен өтеуі керек. Бірақ Дэнджи барлық қарызын өтеген кезде оны не күтіп тұр: ол қарапайым өмір сүре ме, әлде әлемді сайтандардан құтқара ма? Мүмкін тағдырдың кейіпкерге қатысты өз жоспарлары бар шығар?
description.pt-br: Quando seu pai morreu, Denji ficou preso com uma dívida que era incapaz de pagar. Mas graças à ajuda de um cachorro demônio que ele salvou chamado Pochita, Denji é capaz de sobreviver como caçador de demônios de aluguel. Os poderes de serra elétrica do Pochita são bem poderosos contra estes demônios. E então, quando o Denji acaba sendo morto por um demônio, o Pochita desiste de sua vida para revivê-lo. Mas, agora o Denji renasceu como um hibrido de demônio com humano... Agora ele é o "Chainsaw Man"!

altTitles.ja: 鬼虫

description.en: A primitive tribe on an island. During a tempest, a young girl disappears. Ten years later, she mysteriously reappears. The contact with civilization seems to have changed her.

description.ar: رحلة الوصول إلى قمة فنون القتال هي رحلة وحيدة موحشة وطويلة. في مواجهة الشدائد يجب عليك البقاء على قيد الحياة والقتال بلا هوادة، وعندها فقط يمكنك الارتقاء ومتابعة رحلتك لتصبح الأقوى. تختبر طائفة الجناح السماوي الأعلى تلاميذها بأقسى الطرق لإعدادهم لهذه الرحلة، وفي أحد الأيام تمكن المتدرب الضعيف يانغ كاي من الحصول على كتاب أسود مما جعله على الطريق إلى قمة عالم فنون القتال.
description.en:
The peak of martial arts is solitary and lonely. It is an endless pursuit for unattainable heights as well. In order to surpass the limits of martial arts, growth and the will to survive in adverse situations is necessary.
One day, Yang Kai, a disciple-on-trial (and floor sweeper) of the Lingxiao Martial Arts Sect discovered a Wordless Black Book. That marked the turn in his luck and the beginning of his martial arts journey.
description.fr: Le chemin vers le sommet martial (Martial Peak) est long et solitaire. Face à l’adversité, il faut survivre et persévérer. Il est alors possible de percer et poursuivre l'ascension pour devenir le plus fort. Le Haut Pavillon Céleste entraîne ses disciples de la manière la plus sévère afin de les préparer à ce voyage. Un beau jour, le modeste balayeur Yang Kai met la main sur un livre noir, le lançant sur la route vers l'apogée du monde martial.
description.ru: Путь на вершину боевых искусств - путь одинокий и длинный. Перед лицом невзгод ты должен оставаться сильным и неотступным. Только тогда ты сможешь преодолеть все препятствия и стать по-настоящему сильным. Небесная Башня обучает своих учеников самым суровым образом, чтобы они могли выстоять в мире боевых искусств. Но только из-за одного самого незначительного проступка наш главный герой, Янг Кай, может быть исключен из Небесной Башни.
description.uk: Шлях до бойової вершини - самотній, відлюдний і довгий. Перед обличчям негараздів ти повинен вижити і залишатися непохитним. Тільки тоді ти зможеш прорватися і продовжити свій шлях, щоб стати найсильнішим. Небесна вершина випробовує своїх учнів найсуворішими способами, щоб підготувати їх до цієї подорожі. Одного разу скромному підмітальнику Ян Каю вдалося роздобути чорну книгу, яка відкриває йому шлях до вершини світу бойових мистецтв.
description.zh: 《武炼巅峰》漫画版是由深圳漫画团队噼咔噼绘制，根据阅文集团旗起点中文网的同名小说改编，作者是莫默。武之巅峰，是孤独，是寂寞，是漫漫求索，是高处不胜寒。逆境中成长，绝地里求生，才能堪破武之极道。凌霄阁试炼弟子兼扫地小厮杨开偶获一本无字黑书，从此踏上漫漫武道。
description.pt-br: A jornada para o Pico Marcial é algo longo e solitário. Indo de encontro com a adversidade, você deve sobreviver e permanecer vivo. Apenas aqueles que superarem os limites continuarão a jornada rumo ao objetivo de se tornar o mais forte. A Sky Tower testa seus discípulos de maneiras bem complexas para esta jornada. Um dia, o menosprezado Yang Kai conseguiu obter um livro negro, fazendo-o tomar rumo ao pico do mundo marcial.

altTitles.en: Baki Gaiden Scarface: Hanayama High School Stories
Baki Side Story: Scarface: Hanayama School

altTitles.ja: バキ外伝 創面

description.en:
The Adventures of the most dangerous Yazuka in high school, 15 years old Hanayama Kaoru!!  
This is a spin-off of the Baki series, showing the school years of the character Hanayama.

altTitles.en: I Am Going to Be a Bastard
I Want to Be a Scoundrel
I'm Going to Be a Great Villain
I Want to Be a Big Baddie

description.en:
A proper villain must be ruthless and evil, a bringer of death! Having tormented the protagonist to his heart's content, he makes a brilliant exit. Once he's finished his work, he goes out with a bang.
Wang Yi was determined to be that kind of villain. Unfortunately… His male lead can read minds. (:з)∠*)
“You mongrel!” Mr. Yi chuckled as he looked down on the novel’s male lead.
Suddenly, a thought bubble filled with cute emojis (⁄ ⁄ ⁄ω⁄ ⁄ ⁄) and the words “You’re so cute…” appeared in front of Qin.
Qin: ?

Yuhyeon becomes the youngest CEO of Hansung, a successful electronics company built on toxic work culture, but nobody he cares about is there to celebrate with him. After a night of drinking and wondering if he could change the past, he wakes up the next morning, 20 years younger at the beginning of his career.Armed with the experience and insights that made him CEO, Yuhyeon begins to revisit broken relationships and battle the enablers of Hansung’s cut-throat work environment. But he does not yet know how changing the past will affect his future...  (Source: Webtoons)

---
**Original Webtoon:** [Naver](https://comic.naver.com/webtoon/list.nhn?titleId=751168)

---
**Official Translations:** [English](https://www.webtoons.com/en/drama/a-mans-man/list?title_no=2876), [Chinese (Simplified Characters) / 汉语](https://dongmanmanhua.cn/METROPOLIS/nanzihan/list?title_no=1548), [Chinese (Traditional Characters) / 漢語](https://www.webtoons.com/zh-hant/city-office/a-mans-man/list?title_no=3278),  [Indonesian / Bahasa](https://www.webtoons.com/id/drama/the-man/list?title_no=2257), [Japanese / 日本語](https://manga.line.me/product/periodic?id=Z0001100)
description.ru: Хан Ю Хён, лучший офисный работник на небесах и на земле. Потеряв все, он вернулся в прошлое и изменил свою жизнь!

title.en: The Part Time Nation of the Gods

altTitles.en: The Part-Time Land of the Gods
I Became A Part Time Employee For Gods

description.en:
Devoid of professional skills, unemployed Yu Damduk was forced to take a part-time job. Frustrated with his pathetic life, he vents to the gods, gets stricken by lightning and passes out.
[Hiring] God is waiting for you.
When he wakes up, he finds a status window floating before his eyes.
Since I have nothing to lose anyway, let’s go with the flow…
Jumping into God’s Part-time world to have a better life, the adventure of Yu Damduk, who became the lowest-class God in the part-time world, begins!
description.pt-br: Yu Damdeok, que trabalhava meio período por não possuir talento, foi atingido por um raio e perdeu a consciência, sendo levado para o ventre de Deus. O [Anúncio de Recrutamento] dos Deuses te espera. Logo depois, uma janela de status desconhecida apareceu na frente de seus olhos e ele concordou trabalhar meio período para os Deuses pensando que não faria mal... A nação dos deuses que tinha o objetivo de mudar a sua vida e o espírito aventureiro de Yu Damdeok, o tornaram um deus de baixo rank em Parttimeia!

description.en:
Hana was never first. Always because Han Geon Woo came in first every time!
Hana would do anything to best Geon Woo, even though she can't figure him out.
This time, she tried to shock him by confessing...
He believed and accepted the confession though? 
Does he like me?

altTitles.ja: 怪異と乙女と神隠し

description.en: Mysterious incidents in a city, one after the other. A demonic being is challenged to resolve them. Sumireko, seemingly a plain store clerk, aspires to be a novelist and rocks an alluring body with some ardent admirers. Adashino, an admirer who looks like a boy, is a bookstore clerk. He's steeped in mystery however, at first, until the path of challenges is revealed that he and his sister must face in the city in order to win their ticket back home, outside this world. A story of modern mysteries and romantic aspirations begins.
description.ru: Ряд загадочных инцидентов начинают происходить в городе. И всё бы ничего если этот город не был домом для Сумиреко, красивой девушки с писательским стремлением. Какие же происшествия будут ждать Сумиреко и её коллегу по работе, Адашино, полного загадок парня, работающего в книжном?

description.en:
“Hey, don’t get confused. I’ve never thought of you as my little brother. You don’t even know your right place.”   
That was the dagger that hurt the most.  
Han Myoung Woo.  
A child of a wealthy family with a quick mind.  
But god didn’t give him everything.  
A near incurable genetic heart disease  
He did his best in order to earn the respect of the people around him.  
But his father, the chairman, and his family members never took him seriously.  
  
That was when an accident suddenly struck him.  
And…  
He woke up in the body of the severely injured student, Kim Cheol Min.

---

- [Original Webtoon <Webtoon kakao>](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EB%92%A4%EB%81%9D%EC%9E%91%EB%A0%AC/2666)
description.ko:
“야, 착각하지마. 난 한번도 널 동생으로 생각한 적 없어. 주제를 모르고”
가슴을 파고드는 비수였다. 
한명우.
명석한 두뇌와 재벌가의 자식이었다.
다만 하늘은 모든 걸 주지않았다.
불치병 수준인 선천적 심장병.
이를 악물고 인정받기 위해 최선 또 최선을 다했다. 
그러나 아버지인 회장을 비롯해 식구 그 누구도 진심으로 대하지 않았다. 

그러던 그가 급작스런 사고를 당했다.
그리고......
치명적인 부상을 당한 대학생 김철민의 몸으로 들어갔다.
 
건강하다.
아니 건강하다못해 넘친다.
잘돌아가는 머리에 체력까지.......

이제 두 마리 토끼를 잡으러 간다.
꼭 두 마리 토끼여야 했다.

---

- [Original Webtoon <Webtoon kakao>](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EB%92%A4%EB%81%9D%EC%9E%91%EB%A0%AC/2666)
description.ru:
«Эй, не ошибайся. Я никогда не думал о тебе как о своем младшем брате. Ты даже не знаешь свое место ". Это был самый болезненный удар. Хан Мён У - ребёнок из обеспеченной семьи, обладающий хорошим умом. Но не во всём ему повезло в жизни. У него почти неизлечимая генетическая болезнь сердца. Он приложил все усилия, чтобы заслужить уважение окружающих. Но его отец, председатель и члены его семьи никогда не воспринимали его всерьез. Именно тогда с ним внезапно случился несчастный случай. И... Он проснулся в теле тяжело раненого ученика Ким Чхол Мина.

---

- [Original Webtoon <Webtoon kakao>](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EB%92%A4%EB%81%9D%EC%9E%91%EB%A0%AC/2666)

title.en: Maou no Ore ga Dorei Elf wo Yome ni Shitanda ga, Dou Medereba ii?

altTitles.id: Aku, Seorang Raja Iblis, Mengambil Budak Elf Sebagai Istriku, Tapi Bagaimana Cara Aku Mencintainya?

altTitles.en: An Archdemon's Dilemma: How to Love Your Elf Bride

altTitles.pt: Eu, um Lorde Demônio, comprei uma elfa escrava como minha esposa, mas como eu amo ela?

altTitles.en: I, the Demon Lord, Took a Slave Elf as My Wife, but How Do I Love Her?

altTitles.fr: Je, un seigneur des démons, ai épousé un elfe esclavagisant, mais comment l'aime-je?

altTitles.ru: Я, Владыка демонов, взял эльфийку в жёны. И как прикажете её любить?
Я, Владыка демонов, взял эльфийку-рабыню в жёны. И как же мне её любить?

altTitles.zh: 我这魔王娶了一个奴隶精灵当老婆，该怎么疼爱才好？

altTitles.zh-hk: 身為魔王的我娶了奴隸精靈為妻、該如何表白我的愛？

altTitles.ja: 魔王の俺が奴隷エルフを嫁にしたんだが、どう愛でればいい？

altTitles.ko: 마왕인 내가 노예 엘프를 신부로 삼았는데 어떻게 사랑하면 되지?

description.en: Zagan is feared as an evil mage, he is awkward and has a sharp tongue, and once again had to put down thieves that encroached on his territory when he was researching that morning. In a dark auction, he finds a white slave elf, Nephie, who holds a peerless beauty. Falling in love with her at first sight, he uses his fortune to buy her, but as poor as he is socially, he doesn’t understand how to connect with her. Thus, the clumsy cohabitation of the mage that can’t convey his love, and the slave that pines for her master but doesn’t understand how to bring it up, begins.
description.fr:
Zagan est craint comme mage démoniaque, un jour au marché noir il rencontre une esclave elfe du nom de Nephie. De part sa beauté innocente, il tombe sous son charme et décide de l'acheter. Bien que fortuné d'argent, ses compétences sociales ne le sont pas et il a du mal à savoir comment créer une relation…  
  
C'est parti pour une cohabitation maladroite entre ce maître qui ne sait montrer son amour et cette esclave qui en pince pour lui sans savoir quoi faire.
description.pt: Zagan é temido como um mago do mal, ele é desajeitado e tem uma língua afiada, e mais uma vez teve que acabar com ladrões que invadiram seu território quando ele estava pesquisando naquela manhã. Em um leilão clandestino, ele encontra uma elfa branco, Nephie, que possui uma beleza incomparável e estava sendo vendida como uma escrava. Apaixonando-se por ela à primeira vista, ele usa sua fortuna para comprá-la, mas sendo horrível socialmente, ele não entende como se conectar com ela. Assim, a desajeitada coabitação do mago que não pode transmitir seu amor, e a escrava que anseia por seu mestre, mas não sabe como agira, começa.
description.pt-br: Zagan é temido como um mago do mal, ele é desajeitado e tem uma língua afiada, e mais uma vez teve que acabar com ladrões que invadiram seu território quando ele estava pesquisando naquela manhã. Em um leilão clandestino, ele encontra uma elfa branco, Nephie, que possui uma beleza incomparável e estava sendo vendida como uma escrava. Apaixonando-se por ela à primeira vista, ele usa sua fortuna para comprá-la, mas sendo horrível socialmente, ele não entende como se conectar com ela. Assim, a desajeitada coabitação do mago que não pode transmitir seu amor, e a escrava que anseia por seu mestre, mas não sabe como agira, começa.

altTitles.ja: 見せたがりの露乃ちゃん

altTitles.zh-hk: 想要給別人看的露乃醬

altTitles.en: Tsuyuno-chan Who Wants To Show Off

description.en:
A little boy who has an armpit fetish and a high school girl who loves male attention and exposing herself so much so that she doesn't care who it is. When she notices that he has stalked her to her basketball game, she decides it wouldn't be bad to indulge him more.  
  
**Raw: [**[ComicBunch](https://www.comicbunch.com/manga/mon/tsuyunochan/) **|** [KurageBunch](https://kuragebunch.com/episode/13933686331653721909) **|** [NicoNicoBunch](https://seiga.nicovideo.jp/comic/47585)**]**

Yin Wudao, a very rich handsome man. Because of the thief Cao, he was tortured and killed by the Dragon King’s son-in-law. However, he accidentally triggered a god-tier Arch Villain System, and his life began again. Since you have chosen to become a Villain, you must become the greatest villain in history. Dragon King, Divine Physician, God of War, Shura, Ancient Martial Master, Immortal… all the geniuses chosen by the heavens I will send them to hell!!! that way the generation of Villain Kings will come out soon…
description.id: Yin Wudao, seorang pria tampan yang sangat kaya. Karena pencuri Cao, dia disiksa dan dibunuh oleh menantu Raja Naga. Namun, dia secara tidak sengaja memicu Sistem Penjahat Agung tingkat dewa, dan hidupnya dimulai lagi. Karena Anda telah memilih untuk menjadi Penjahat, Anda harus menjadi penjahat terhebat dalam sejarah. Raja Naga, Tabib Ilahi, Dewa Perang, Shura, Master Bela Diri Kuno, Abadi... semua orang jenius yang dipilih oleh surga akan kukirimkan ke neraka!!!! dengan cara itu generasi Raja Penjahat akan segera keluar...
